mapper.update: UPDATE sig_user SET user_username=#{user_username}, user_password=#{user_password}, user_fullname=#{user_fullname}, user_email=#{user_email} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT us.user_id, us.user_username, us.user_fullname, us.user_email FROM sig_user us INNER JOIN sig_friend fr ON fr.friend_user_id = us.user_id WHERE fr.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY us.user_fullname DESC

SELECT us.user_id, us.user_username, us.user_fullname, us.user_email FROM sig_user us LEFT OUTER JOIN sig_friend fr ON fr.friend_user_id = us.user_id WHERE (fr.user_id != #{user_id} AND fr.friend_user_id != #{user_id}) OR fr.friend_user_id IS NULL AND us.user_id != #{user_id} ORDER BY us.user_fullname DESC
